attributes.action: Intervene with the closure of Woolworth’s stores, which is resulting in the mass loss of jobs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Woolworth’s, once the country’s leading household named store are currently closing off city centre stores York being the most recent.  Staff get told 20 days before the store is too close, even though that the decision will have been made at least 6 months previous.  This doesn’t just affect Woolworth’s staff, but also contractors for example, the cleaning company solo, have contracts to clean the stores, and there restaurants are also owned by Compass group, so more and more staff are losing there jobs!
